oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Charlie Daniels Interview - Biff Collie
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Charlie Daniels (performer), conducted by Biff Collie [unconfirmed].
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Charlie Daniels talks about Loretta Lynn and wanting to work with her -- Charlie Daniels talks about never having heard Loretta Lynn's Pregnant Again -- Charlie Daniels talks about his philosophy on life, living one day at a time and treat everyone how he wants to be treated -- Charlie Daniels talks about loving to play and write music and his family -- Charlie Daniels talks about being influenced by his wife, Bob Johnson, and Bob Dylan -- Daniels talks about playing golf with Moe Bandy -- Daniels talks about meeting Crystal Gayle and her husband -- Daniels talks about Bobby Bare and how everyone likes him -- Daniels talks about his great respect for Willie Nelson and his method of singing and playing guitar -- Daniels talks about how Willie Nelson goings running every morning -- Daniels talking about how musicians who are out on the road a lot do not tend to party a lot as it wears down their bodies
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Collie, Biff; Daniels, Charlie, 1936-;
